channel.title: Compiling Error!

item.title: Compiling Error!
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I was adding jail into the right-click menu and it compiled fine, but when I tried to log in it gave me an error so I deleted the stuff I put in the client class and I got this error: [code] ^
client.java:20630: illegal start of expression
